text: Helena Sofia (Helene) Schjerfbeck (July 10, 1862 â€“ January 23, 1946) was a Finnish painter. She painted in realist and modernist styles. She is known for her self-portraits, landscapes and still lifes. Schjerfbeck's birthday, 10 July, is Finland's national day for the painted arts. == Paintings by Helene Schjerfbeck == Category:1862 births Category:1946 deaths Category:Finnish artists Category:Painters from Europe Category:People from Helsinki
title: Helene Schjerfbeck
